data.title: Aion Shop
data.description: I had the opportunity to build the entire in-game shop for Aion.  It is a robust React.js application that handles all of the purchase of items, currencies, and services for Aion.

data.title: Lineage 2 Shop
data.description: I assisted in the creation of the marketing site for Lineage 2, with a focus on the Shop Overview page.  I also created the modular React application that powers all cash purchases for all NCSoft products in the western market.

data.title: Portfolios
data.description: Living in Irvine, and being a gamer, it is inevitable that I would apply to Blizzard Entertainment.  I used this as an opportunity to learn new technologies.  I created several portfolio sites through the years, based off of Blizzard games.
